Introducing SMT

Swarm Markets Token (SMT) operates on the Ethereum blockchain following the ERC20 standard, facilitating smoother transactions within Swarm’s RWA platform. Designed to create a streamlined experience, SMT offers users reduced protocol fees and rewards based on liquidity, RWA issuance and staking. It’s not just a payment token; it’s a fundamental part of Swarm’s ecosystem, enhancing user engagement and incentivizing the issuance of tokenized assets, including stocks, bonds, and commodities.

Dive deeper into SMT.

ONDO explained

The ONDO token is the cornerstone of the Ondo Foundation’s initiative to usher in a new era of financial inclusivity and efficiency. As a governance token for the ONDO DAO, it plays a pivotal role in democratizing decisions within the platform. The foundation, a nonprofit entity with no beneficial owners, focuses on creating and promoting on-chain financial products that are accessible to all, thereby fostering a fairer financial landscape.

Get to know ONDO.

Understanding TRUF

TRUF is an innovative ERC20 token that underpins the Truflation Stream Network (TSN), a unique platform designed to integrate real-time economic data into decentralized finance applications. TRUF facilitates operations of data provider nodes and supports the processes of data provision, consumption, and governance. It’s geared towards empowering the tokenization of real-world assets and providing accurate economic metrics for better financial decision-making.

Learn more about TRUF.

These new cryptocurrencies diversify the trading options available on Bitstamp while also bringing fresh utilities and innovations into the ecosystem. From fostering financial inclusivity to integrating real-time economic data into blockchain technologies, these tokens represent our ongoing commitment to enhancing the trading experience for our community.

We invite you to explore these new offerings and consider how they might fit into your crypto strategies. Whether you're looking for engagement, governance, or real-time data integration, these tokens provide a range of options to enhance your portfolio.
